Text: COLA and Relocation Information Cc If you were to accept a rotation in Chicago your costofliving adjustment would be In addition we would also facilitate your relocation from Houston to Chicago You would be eligible to receive relocation allowance to cover expenses outside of the household move ie house hunting trip meals etc You also have the option to have the company move your household goods We will provide a professional carrier to pack and move your goods or you can opt to do a self move and receive another This amount is before tax Please let me know if you have any questions Ivonne Brown ext

Re Relocation to ChicagoActually the relocation department will give you the option to receive the funds by credit card check or wire You will not have to submit an expense report Thanks ib Robin CT AM To Ivonne NRON cc Subject Re Relocation to Chicago Ivonne Thanks for the information Will I receive the automatically on my paycheck or do I need to submit an expense report to be reimbursed for any expenses I incur If I do need to submit an expense report who should I turn it in to Thanks Robin Enron North America Corp From Ivonne Brown ENRON AM To Robin CT cc Subject Relocation to Chicago Robin You will be receiving a costofliving adjustment of when you relocate to Chicago plus an additional per month In addition we will provide relocation assistance for your household goods and car transportation Allowance will cover expenses which are outside the movement of your household goods This amount is before taxes Household goods move Option Full service of household goods Option Self move This amount is before taxes Please let me know if you need additional information Thanks Ivonne Brown

Updated ResumePST Hi Holden Just a quick followup to my voice message yesterday could you please send me a copy of your updated resume We need it for PRC purposes Thanks Ivonne Brown Associate Analyst Program Ext

RE Question on vision planHi Monika VSP does not provide you with an insurance card but your doctor will verify your benefits after you give himher your name and date of birth and your social security number To find a provider you can call or go to the web site at wwwvspcom Please let me know if you need additional information Thanks Ivonne Original Message From Causholli Monika Sent Friday October PM To Brown Ivonne Subject Question on vision plan Hello Ivonne I do not have an insurance card for the vision health plan Can you tell me what I need to do to before I go to a doctor Also should I find my own doctor or is there a list of names provided Can you clarify this to me or tell me who do I need to contact for this thanks Monika Causholli
